Neelu the butterfly was scolding her son Katty, the caterpillar, "Why did you eat all the leaves of the plants? Why do you overeat? The gardener is angry. He is looking for you. Why? don't yath'ever use your brain? "What can I do mother? My brain is in my tummy, so I do what my tummy tells me to do," replied Katty.

"Don't give me excuses. Just stay here. Let me go and see where that angry gardener is. Sit here quietly till I come back," said Neelu, and flew away.

Katty, the caterpillar quietly sat on a leaf. But soon he felt hungry. 'I will go back to the garden and eat some more leaves. I shall come back before mother comes,' thought the hungry caterpillar, and left for the garden.

Katty, the caterpillar huffed and puffed while crawling because he had overeaten. He felt tired, so he rested on the leaves of a plant.

.Katty started crying and called out, "Mom! Where are you? Please help me!" Neelu, the butterfly heard Katty's voice and came flying to him. The butterfly politely requested the gardener to free the caterpillar.

.Katty started crying and called out, "Mom! Where are you? Please help me!" Neelu, the butterfly heard Katty's voice and came flying to him. The butterfly politely requested the gardener to free the caterpillar.

Tears were rolling down Katty's face. Seeing this, the gardener's heart melted. He told the caterpillar to be careful next time. Neelu thanked the gardener. Katty quickly got off the plant and went away with his mother. He promised her that he would not be greedy in future.
